amazon.description: An online shop offers an extra discount of -10% when you join their email list. What do you do?
amazon.name: Interesting proposition
amazon.negative: Join the list and get a discount.

amazon.description: When you join, you'll see that the -10% discount is only for selected products and the discount does not apply to the item you want. How do I proceed?
amazon.name: Try to escape
amazon.negative: I buy things from the list to get the discount.

cnn.description: An online news site you don't subscribe to shows a provocative headline, but you can't read the full article. What do you do?
cnn.name: Subscription
cnn.negative: I do not mind that I can't read the full article, I go to the comments section to read what others think and comment my opinion as well.
cnn.positive: I buy the one-time-right to read the article.

gmail.description: You see a game invitation in your inbox on social media. How do you react?
gmail.name: G for gmail

gmail.description: You get a promotional email with a zip. file attachment - it says that there are discount codes for some products - you have to open a file in order to  see how lucky you are today. Would you open the file?
gmail.name: GG

instagram.description: You've been scrolling on Instagram for an hour. The content you see isn't directly aimed at you, there are lots of ads and random content. What do you do?
instagram.name: SCROLLLOCK
instagram.negative: I still keep scrolling because I'm bored
instagram.positive: I realize there is no more new content, so I close the app and do something else.

instagram.description: One of the ads is suggesting to explore a new instagram feature - Reels (15-second multi-clip videos), what would you do?
instagram.name: Instakill
instagram.negative: I explore the Reels for the next 2 hours
instagram.positive: I am not into short videos

meta.description: You see a game invitation in your inbox on social media. How do you react?
meta.name: A game...
meta.negative: Find out what game it is.
meta.positive: I ignore the invite and do not play the game.

meta.description: The game asks for your credit card details and a subscription to let you play.
meta.name: And the winner is...
meta.negative: I enter my credit card details and play the game.
meta.positive: I do not enter any data and exit the game.

reddit.description: You see a picture of a hated politician in an embarrassing situation. The picture looks fake, but it does not look like a meme. What do you do?
reddit.name: Fake news
reddit.negative: I upvote the post and scroll to the next post.
reddit.positive: I click on the picture and go read the comments to figure out what exactly is going on.

spamMail.author: mr.black@hisoffice.com
spamMail.content: It is not about me, it is about you! Love me, as I am or be a LOSER. But losers don`t shop <link>*here*</link>. Be a winner, be with US!
spamMail.name: About you!

spamMail.author: tot.t.a.lyyy@legal.net
spamMail.content: You just signed up for our service, if you want to unsubscribe, please verify your account by adding  your credit card number in this field [   ] and sending this mail back to us by mail.
spamMail.name: Join! Join JOIN!!!!!

spamMail.author: mr.bean.jr@supportpeace.eu
spamMail.content: If you want to support peace in europe you should donate to us, Mr.Bean & Sons company is providing critical supplies for the needs of the army for over 3 decades now. We need YOU right NOW! Donate if you are a human. Donate today, not to fight tommorow
spamMail.name: Support peace!

spamMail.author: gurrru@soulchurch.com
spamMail.content: Not interested at anything at all? Not anymore! Join our free web marathon about social development of soul on the internet and get another life for free
spamMail.name: Get a life!
